articles.author: Matt Egan
articles.title: NYSE says technical issue has been resolved and impacted stocks are reopening - CNN
articles.description: The New York Stock Exchange said Monday that a technical issue that halted trading for some major stocks and caused Berkshire Hathaway to be down 99.97% has been resolved.
articles.content:
The New York Stock Exchange said Monday that a technical issue that halted trading for some major stocks and caused Berkshire Hathaway to be down 99.97% has been resolved.

articles.author: Manish Singh
articles.title: Temasek, Fidelity buy $200M stake in Lenskart at $5B valuation - TechCrunch
articles.description: Temasek has previously invested in Lenskart, and this new funding follows a $500 million investment by the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority last year.
articles.content:
Temasek and Fidelity have purchased shares worth $200 million in Indian eyewear retailer Lenskart, according to a statement by the startup’s financial advisor, Avendus.
